status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Local notifications have a "repeat" property which accepts daily, meekly, monthly.  Need the ability to have hourly or by minute as well.  Some people from the community have already hacked a solution via:  http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/126950/repeating-localnotifications

There is also a module someone created to get around the limitation as well.
